00045 void init(int ncells)
00046 {
00047     pc = new ParSpike;
00048     nhost = pc.nhost;
00049     if (nhost < 2) { // for no PVM or MPI and for 1 host
00050         nhost = 1;
00051         myid = 0;
00052     } else {
00053         myid = pc.id;
00054     }
00055     nwork = nhost;
00056     ncell = ncells;
00057 
00058     //cells = new List() // the worker cells
00059     //nclist = new List() // the netcons connecting to cells in this subset
00060 
00061     maxstepsize_called_ = 0;
00062     want_graph_ = 0;
00063     edgecount_ = 0;
00064     spikevec.resize(0);
00065     idvec.resize(0);
00066 }
00067 
00068 // originally
00069 // the gid <-> cell map was constructed in two phases.
00070 // first we specify which gids will exist on this machine.
00071 // Then, when create_cell is called we can decide if the cell
00072 // will actually be created and, if so, pc.presyn actually
00073 // creates the PreSyn, sets the gid, and makes the gid2PreSyn map.
00074 // that is deprecated.
00075 // Now it is best merely to call
00076 // register_cell(gid, cellobject) and that will both call gid_exists (if it
00077 // does not already exist), and make the mapping.
00078 
00079 void set_gid2node(int cell_id)
00080 {
00081     pc.set_gid2node(cell_id, myid);
00082 }
00083 
00084 void round_robin()   // simplistic partitioning
00085 {
00086     for (register int i = 0; i < ncell; ++i) {
00087         set_gid2node(i, i % nwork);
00088     }
00089 }
00090 
00091 bool gid_exists(int cell_id)
00092 {
00093     return pc.gid_exists(cell_id);
00094 }
00095 
00096 void  want_all_spikes()
00097 {
00098     local i
00099     for (register int i = 0; i < ncell; ++i) {
00100         spike_record(i);
00101     }
00102 }
00103 
00104 void spike_record(int cell_id)
00105 {
00106     if (gid_exists(cell_id)) {
00107         pc.spike_record(cell_id, spikevec, idvec);
00108     }
00109 }

00111 // arg is gid and string that creates a cell such as "new Cell(x, y, z)"
00112 // return the cell object (usually nil)
00113 // this is deprecated
00114 void create_cell(int cell_id, NeuronType * nt)
00115 {
00116     if (gid_exists(cell_id)) {
00117         register_cell(cell_id, nt)
00118     }
00119 
00120 }
00121 
00122 void register_cell(int cell_id, void* cell)
00123 {
00124     void * nc;
00125     if (!pc.gid_exists($1)) {
00126         pc.set_gid2node(cell_id, pc.id);
00127     }
00128     // all existing cells must have an associated gid which
00129     // is stored in the cell's PreSyn. The nc below will be
00130     // unreffed but the PreSyn will continue
00131     // in existence and from the gid we will quickly be able
00132     // to find the PreSyn and from that the Cell
00133     // we force the cell to be an outputcell due to the danger of
00134     // user error
00135     cells.append(cell)
00136     nc = new NetCon(cell, nil)
00137     pc.cell(cell_id, nc, 1);
00138 }
00139 
00140 void nc_append(int precell_id, int postcell_id)
00141 {
00142     int w, se, ww, i = -1;
00143     if (gid_exists(postcell_id)) {
00144         // target in this subset
00145         // source may be on this or another machine
00146         nc = cm2t(precell_id, pc->gid2cell(postcell_id), $3, $4, $5)
00147              i = nclist.count
00148                  nclist.append(nc)
00149     } else if ((se = gid_exists(precell_id)) > 0) {
00150         // source exists but not the target
00151         if (se != 3) { // output to another machine and it is
00152             // not yet an outputcell
00153             pc->outputcell(precell_id);
00154         }
00155     }
00156 
00157 }
00158 
00159 obfunc cm2t(int precell_id, void * postcell, int postcell_synid = -1, double weight = 0.0, double delay = 0.0)
00160 {
00161     if ($3 < 0) {
00162         nc = pc->gid_connect(precell_id, $o2)
00163     } else {
00164         nc = pc->gid_connect(precell_id, postcell->synlist[postcell_synid])
00165          }
00166          nc->weight = $4
00167                       nc->delay = $5
00168                                   return nc
00169                                      }

00172 {
00173     // arg is max allowed, return val is just for this subnet
00174     localmaxstep_ = pc.set_maxstep(10); // arg is the maximum allowed
00175 //  printf("%d localmaxstep=%g\n", myid, localmaxstep_)

00178 proc maxstepsize()
00179 {
00180     local i, m
00181     if (!maxstepsize_called_) {
00182         maxstepsize_called_ = 1
00183         if (nwork > 1) {
00184             pc.context(this, "set_maxstep")
00185         }
00186         set_maxstep()
00187     }
00188 }
00189 
00190 // a safe way to get output sequentially on a per host basis
00191 // without using the bulletin board. A file should be opened
00192 // with File.aopen for appending at the beginning of the iterator_statement
00193 // and closed at the end.
00194 iterator serialize()
00195 {
00196     local rank
00197     pc.barrier
00198     for rank = 0, pc.nhost {
00199     if (rank == pc.id) {
00200             iterator_statement
00201         }
00202         pc.barrier
00203     }
00204 }
00205 
00206 proc doinit()
00207 {
00208     stdinit()
00209 }
00210 
00211 proc pinit()
00212 {
00213     maxstepsize()
00214     if (nwork > 1) {
00215         pc.context(this, "doinit")
00216     }
00217     doinit() // the master does one also
00218 }
00219 
00220 proc psolve()
00221 {
00222     pc.psolve($1)
00223 }
00224 
00225 proc pcontinue()
00226 {
00227     if (nwork > 1) {
00228         pc.context(this, "psolve", $1)
00229     }
00230     psolve($1)
00231 }
00232 
00233 proc prun()
00234 {
00235     pinit()
00236     pcontinue(tstop)
00237 }
00238 
00239 proc postwait()
00240 {
00241     local w, sm, s, r, ru
00242     if ($1 == 0) {
00243         pc.post("waittime", myid, pc.wait_time())
00244     } else {
00245         w = pc.wait_time()
00246             sm = pc.spike_statistics(&s, &r, &ru)
00247                  pc.post("poststat", myid, w, sm, s, r, ru)
00248              }
00249          }
00250 
00251          proc prstat()
00252 {
00253     local i, id, w, sm, s, r, ru // print the wait time and statis
00254     if (nwork > 1) {
00255         pc.context(this, "postwait", $1)
00256     }
00257     postwait($1)
00258     if ($1 == 0) {
00259         for i = 0, nwork - 1 {
00260         pc.take("waittime", &id, &w)
00261             printf("%d wait time %g\n", id, w)
00262         }
00263     } else {
00264         printf("id\t nsmax\t nsend\t nrecv\t nrused\t wait\n")
00265         for i = 0, nwork - 1 {
00266         pc.take("poststat", &id, &w, &sm, &s, &r, &ru)
00267             printf("%d\t %d\t %d\t %d\t %d\t %g\n", id, sm, s, r, ru, w)
00268         }
00269         printf("end of prstat\n")
00270     }
00271 }
00272 
00273 proc postspikes()
00274 {
00275     pc.post("postspike", spikevec, idvec);
00276 }
00277 
00278 proc gatherspikes()
00279 {
00280     local i
00281 
00282     if (nwork > 1) {
00283         std::vector<float> s, id;
00284         pc.context(this, "postspikes")
00285         for i = 0, nwork - 2 {
00286         pc.take("postspike", s, id)
00287             spikevec.append(s);
00288             idvec.append(id);
00289         }
00290     }
00291 }
